subject: Re: A new concept-- I asked a question.
author: bhali333
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>
> 
>  This is after I changed the echo box speakers, and I wanted to test 
the panel mic. The panel mic can be turned on and off, and doesn't come 
through the monitor speaker to prevent feedback. 
>  
>  I asked about guides, and a voice said "ok" then I asked again, and 
it was like it took a couple attempts to say "Randal Is Here" ( I 
think). I have heard the name a few times over the last month or so. 
>  
>  Frank-S
> _________________________________________________________________
> Windows Live Hotmail and Microsoft Office Outlook  together at 
last. Get it now.
> http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/outlook/HA102225181033.aspx?
pid=CL100626971033
>

Frank,

I heard o.k. and randal, when you finished the question 
then randal again at the end of the file.

I know thier talking from the other side but it sounds like if
you were standing in a room recording somone in another room
sounds very whispery and muffled but if you listen carefully you can
hear what's being said.

bruce
